name: INTERACT: ADVOCATES FOR INTERSEX YOUTH (FKA INTERACT)
description: 501(c)(3) non-profit advocating for the human rights of children born with intersex traits
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Proposed legislation to prohibit use of federal funds for medically unnecessary surgeries on intersex infants.
